titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Blackfoot Development Corporation (Lincoln, Mont.) Records 1970
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by MarcEdit

publicationstmt.publisher: Maureen and Mike Mansfield Library, The University of Montana--Missoula

profiledesc.descrules: Finding aid based on DACS (Describing Archives: A Content Standard)

repository.corpname: University of Montana, Mansfield Library, Archives and Special Collections

did.abstract: The collection of the corporate records of the Blackfoot Development Corporation of Lincoln, Montana, includes the official seal, articles of incorporation, minutes and by-laws, blank stock certificates, and a blank stock transfer ledger.

bioghist.p: The Blackfoot Development Corporation of Lincoln, Montana, was incorporated on June 11, 1970. The stockholders included Charles Lane, Jr., Robert J. Garnett, and James R. Palmer. The organization was approved for land development, housing, construction, wholesale and retail operations, agriculture commodities, financial institutions, leasing, dealerships, and other franchises.

scopecontent.p: The collection of the corporate records of the Blackfoot Development Corporation includes the official seal, articles of incorporation, minutes and by-laws, blank stock certificates, and a blank stock transfer ledger.

accessrestrict.p: Researchers must use collection in accordance with the policies of Archives and Special Collections, the Maureen and Mike Mansfield Library, and The University of Montana--Missoula.

userestrict.p: Researchers are responsible for using in accordance with 17 U.S.C. and any other applicable statutes.

acqinfo.p: Gift of the Great Falls Public Library, 1983.
